alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Garfield; McCone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 6:57PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Phillips, Garfield, southwestern Valley and northwestern McCone Counties through 745 PM MDT... At 655 PM MDT, strong thunderstorms were along a line extending from 11 miles east of Devils Creek Rec Area to 12 miles east of Mosby. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Weather stations indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jordan, Sand Springs, Hell Creek Rec Area, Edwards, Cohagen, Brusett, The Pines Rec Area, Haxby and Steve Fork. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near Fort Peck Lake/Crooked Creek, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Garfield; McCone
